AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fog Member
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was born from the chest of its Queen, it grew quickly and began guiding the drones of its Fog.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fog Prince
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} grew into its duty as a Fog prince through its adulthood as a guide to its fellow drones. It mostly acted as an overseer of construction and resource management, but when then time came it also commanded the Heavy castes.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fog Tradesman
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was sent out into the world near and far to trade with settlements, guarded by its security detail it followed trade routes in search of the next market. It quickly became a master of trade negotiations with a sharp tongue and a quick mind.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fog Practitioner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} spent its adulthood as a doctor and healer for its Fog; it would operate on worker drones who had their limbs cut off, and heal the wounds the Heavy castes obtained from defending the colony - though if a Fogman was wounded beyond its skill-set, they were simply cremated alive in the Fog's furnaces.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Healer Prince
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was dedicated to saving as many of its fellow Fogmans as it could, in its eyes no Fogman was ever too far gone to be burnt in the furnaces. It healed sick and wounded Fogmans, installed prosthetics for the various amputees of the Fog, and even mended the wounds of human travelers.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Drone Commander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Out on the battlefield is where {PAWN_nameDef} excelled, it lead the warrior drones against enemies of their Fog - butting heads with the savage-Fogmans over territory, and repelling the human raiders from its land - its strategic mind was the brightest of its Fog.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fog Huntsman
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: After its worker drones could not hunt animals properly without ending up savaged and mauled, {PAWN_nameDef} took up the mantle as the Fog's hunter, deftly stalking various game; putting meat on the tables, and food in the bellies of its Fog.
